kb.name: en-wikipedia
kb.description: English Wikipedia shortly after the end of 2011.  snapshot_time is when the last part of this dump finished: http://dumps.wikimedia.org/enwiki/20120104/.  topic_names are the so-called 'urlname' within English Wikipedia on the snapshot date.  A URL for the entity's article page can be constructed by appending its topic name to kb.URL
